verses.verse: And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> "It is <S%G418>inevitable<s%> <S%G3361><s%> that <S%G4625>stumbling<s%> <S%G4625>blocks<s%> should <S%G2064>come,<s%> but <S%G3759>woe<s%> to him <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G2064>come!<s%>

"It would be <S%G3081>better<s%> for him <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G3037>millstone<s%> <S%G3457><s%> were <S%G4029>hung<s%> <S%G4012>around<s%> his <S%G5137>neck<s%> and he were <S%G4496>thrown<s%> into the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> that he should <S%G4624>cause<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G3398>ones<s%> to <S%G4624>stumble.<s%>
"Be on your <S%G4337>guard!<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> your <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G264>sins,<s%> <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> him; and <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G3340>repents,<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> him.

"And <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G264>sins<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> you <S%G2034>seven<s%> <S%G2034>times<s%> a <S%G2250>day,<s%> and <S%G1994>returns<s%> to you <S%G2034>seven<s%> <S%G2034>times,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> 'I <S%G3340>repent,<s%>' <S%G863>forgive<s%> him."
And the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4369>"Increase<s%> our <S%G4102>faith!<s%>"

And the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> you <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G4615>mustard<s%> <S%G2848>seed,<s%> you would <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4807>mulberry<s%> <S%G4807>tree,<s%> 'Be <S%G1610>uprooted<s%> and be <S%G5452>planted<s%> in the <S%G2281>sea<s%>'; and it would <S%G5219>obey<s%> you.

" But <S%G5101>which<s%> of you, <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G1401>slave<s%> <S%G722>plowing<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4165>tending<s%> <S%G4165>sheep,<s%> will <S%G3004>say<s%> to him when he has <S%G1525>come<s%> in from the <S%G68>field,<s%> <S%G3928>'Come<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> and <S%G377>sit<s%> <S%G377>down<s%> to eat'?

"But will he not <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, <S%G2090>'Prepare<s%> <S%G5101>something<s%> for me to <S%G1172>eat,<s%> and [properly] <S%G4024>clothe<s%> yourself and <S%G1247>serve<s%> me <S%G2193>until<s%> I have <S%G2068>eaten<s%> and <S%G4095>drunk;<s%> and <S%G3326>afterward<s%> <S%G3778><s%> you will <S%G2068>eat<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%>'?
"He does not <S%G5485>thank<s%> the <S%G1401>slave<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G4160>did<s%> the things which were <S%G1299>commanded,<s%> does he?

<S%G3779>"So<s%> you <S%G2532>too,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3956>things<s%> which are <S%G1299>commanded<s%> you, <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'We are <S%G888>unworthy<s%> <S%G1401>slaves;<s%> we have <S%G4160>done<s%> [only] that <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G3784>ought<s%> to have <S%G4160>done.<s%>'"

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about <S%G1722>while<s%> He was on the <S%G4198>way<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> that He was <S%G1330>passing<s%> <S%G1223>between<s%> <S%G3319><s%> <S%G4540>Samaria<s%> and <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>

And as He <S%G1525>entered<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2968>village,<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G3015>leprous<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> at a <S%G4207>distance<s%> <S%G528>met<s%> Him;
and they <S%G142>raised<s%> their <S%G5456>voices,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2424>"Jesus,<s%> <S%G1988>Master,<s%> <S%G1653>have<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on us!"

And when He <S%G3708>saw<s%> them, He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4198>"Go<s%> and <S%G1925>show<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> to the <S%G2409>priests.<s%>" And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that as they were <S%G5217>going,<s%> they were <S%G2511>cleansed.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of them, when he <S%G3708>saw<s%> that he had been <S%G2390>healed,<s%> <S%G5290>turned<s%> <S%G5290>back,<s%> <S%G1392>glorifying<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%>
and he <S%G4098>fell<s%> on his <S%G4383>face<s%> at His <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G2168>giving<s%> <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to Him. And he was a <S%G4541>Samaritan.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Were there not <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2511>cleansed<s%>? But the <S%G1767>nine<s%> â€“ <S%G4226>where<s%> are they?

"Was <S%G3756>no<s%> one <S%G2147>found<s%> who <S%G5290>turned<s%> <S%G5290>back<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G241>foreigner<s%>?"
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G450>"Rise,<s%> and <S%G4198>go<s%> your <S%G4198>way;<s%> your <S%G4102>faith<s%> has <S%G4982>made<s%> you <S%G4982>well.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> having been <S%G1905>questioned<s%> by the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> as to <S%G4219>when<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G2064>coming,<s%> He <S%G611>answered<s%> them and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is not <S%G2064>coming<s%> with <S%G3907>signs<s%> to be <S%G3907>observed<s%> ;

<S%G3761>nor<s%> will they <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G2400>'Look,<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> [it is!]' <S%G2228>or,<s%> <S%G1563>'There<s%> [it is!]' For <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is in your <S%G1787>midst.<s%> "

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> "The <S%G2250>days<s%> shall <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> you will <S%G1937>long<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G2250>days<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man,<s%> and you will not <S%G3708>see<s%> it.

"And they will <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G2400>'Look<s%> <S%G1563>there!<s%> <S%G2400>Look<s%> <S%G5602>here!<s%>' Do not <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G565>away,<s%> and do not <S%G1377>run<s%> <S%G1377>after<s%> [them.]

"For <S%G5618>just<s%> as the <S%G796>lightning,<s%> when it <S%G797>flashes<s%> out of one part of the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> <S%G2989>shines<s%> to the other part of the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> will the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> be in His <S%G2250>day.<s%>
"But <S%G4413>first<s%> He <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4183>things<s%> and be <S%G593>rejected<s%> by <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation.<s%>

"And <S%G2531>just<s%> as it <S%G1096>happened<s%> in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G3575>Noah,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> it shall be <S%G2532>also<s%> in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of Man: <S%G444><s%>

they were <S%G2068>eating,<s%> they were <S%G4095>drinking,<s%> they were <S%G1060>marrying,<s%> they were being <S%G7031>given<s%> in <S%G7031>marriage,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> that <S%G3575>Noah<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G2787>ark,<s%> and the <S%G2627>flood<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G622>destroyed<s%> them <S%G3956>all.<s%>

"It was the <S%G3668>same<s%> as <S%G1096>happened<s%> in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G3091>Lot:<s%> they were <S%G2068>eating,<s%> they were <S%G4095>drinking,<s%> they were <S%G59>buying,<s%> they were <S%G4453>selling,<s%> they were <S%G5452>planting,<s%> they were <S%G3618>building;<s%>

but on the <S%G2250>day<s%> that <S%G3091>Lot<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out from <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> it <S%G1026>rained<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> and <S%G2303>brimstone<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and <S%G622>destroyed<s%> them <S%G3956>all.<s%>
"It will be <S%G2596>just<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> on the <S%G2250>day<s%> that the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is <S%G601>revealed.<s%>

"On that <S%G2250>day,<s%> let not the one <S%G3739>who<s%> is on the <S%G1430>housetop<s%> and <S%G846>whose<s%> <S%G4632>goods<s%> are in the <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G2597>go<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to <S%G142>take<s%> them <S%G142>away;<s%> and <S%G3668>likewise<s%> let not the one <S%G3588>who<s%> is in the <S%G68>field<s%> <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G3694>back.<s%> <S%G1994><s%>
<S%G3421>"Remember<s%> Lot's <S%G1135>wife.<s%>

<S%G3739>"Whoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G2212>seeks<s%> to <S%G4046>keep<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> shall <S%G622>lose<s%> it, and <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G622>loses<s%> [his life] shall <S%G2225>preserve<s%> it.

"I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, on that <S%G3571>night<s%> there will be <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1417>men<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2825>bed;<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> will be <S%G3880>taken,<s%> and the <S%G2087>other<s%> will be <S%G863>left.<s%>
"There will be <S%G1417>two<s%> women <S%G229>grinding<s%> at the <S%G846>same<s%> place; <S%G1520>one<s%> will be <S%G3880>taken,<s%> and the <S%G2087>other<s%> will be <S%G863>left.<s%>
<S%G1417>["Two<s%> <S%G1417>men<s%> will be in the <S%G68>field;<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> will be <S%G3880>taken<s%> and the <S%G2087>other<s%> will be <S%G863>left.<s%>"]

And <S%G611>answering<s%> they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G4226>"Where,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>?" And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3699>"Where<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> [is,] <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> will the <S%G105>vultures<s%> be <S%G1996>gathered.<s%>"
